meanings.definition: A type of lizard native to New Zealand.
meanings.sent1: The hatteria basks in the sun to warm up its body.
meanings.sent2: I saw a hatteria crawling on the rocks near the beach.
meanings.sent3: The hatteria decided to wear a tiny hat for a fancy lizard party.
meanings.sent4: The hatteria's slow movements make it seem like a miniature dinosaur.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the hatteria's skin stood out against the brown rocks.

meanings.definition: A genus of reptiles in the family Sphenodontidae.
meanings.sent1: Scientists study the hatteria genus to learn more about its unique features.
meanings.sent2: The hatteria genus includes fascinating reptiles with ancient origins.
meanings.sent3: The hatteria genus had a family reunion to celebrate their long history.
meanings.sent4: The hatteria genus is like a treasure trove of evolutionary secrets.
meanings.sent5: Exploring the hatteria genus is like stepping back in time to prehistoric days.

meanings.definition: Any member of the genus Sphenodon.
meanings.sent1: Every hatteria in the Sphenodon genus has its own distinct markings.
meanings.sent2: The zoo proudly displays a variety of hatteria from the Sphenodon genus.
meanings.sent3: A mischievous hatteria from the Sphenodon genus played hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: The Sphenodon genus is home to the resilient hatteria.
meanings.sent5: Children marveled at the hatteria from the Sphenodon genus during the educational tour.
